subject: Preakness Stakes
Big Brown (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Big Brown, ridden by Kent Desormeaux, soared to a five-and-a-quarter-length victory in the 133rd running of the Preakness Stakes.
snippet: Big Brown, ridden by Kent Desormeaux, soared to a five-and-a-quarter-length victory in the 133rd running of the Preakness Stakes.
